featured.text: He saw a man with a hole in the leg of his trousers and 29 realized what Californians 30 for the rough work they were doing—good, strong trousers! 21.

definition.zh_def: 加利福尼亞州的居民或出生於加利福尼亞州的人。
definition.en_def: Residents or natives of the state of California.
definition.example: Californians enjoy a diverse culture and beautiful landscapes.
